jobDescription: Responsibilities:Independently interacts with client management to prioritize projects, tasks and deliverables.Independently leads project meetings to ensure alignment with client expectations and timelines.Independently executes data analysis using appropriate tools and techniques.Interprets results and presents to the both internal and external clients.Additional duties as required for the efficient, smooth and timely flow of work and information.Qualifications/Skills:Five to seven years of hands on experience mining and analyzing data using SQL required.Five to seven years utilizing Microsoft Excel and PowerPoint to present data required.Five to seven years analyzing very large customer data stores required.Five to seven years analyzing automotive data in a marketing setting required.Five to seven years of assessing and trouble-shooting data issues on multiple platforms.Three to five years presenting clear and concise data analysis to management.Three to five years interacting with both business and technical management.Three to five years leading client projects that may include multiple team members.Expertise within consumer and or VIN oriented database compilation and database operating systems (DB2, Teradata, Hadoop and SQL Server)Experience with IT system design methodologies and project management principles.Experience with running complex analysis and database queries in relational database management systems: Teradata, Hadoop, SQL Server and DB2 using SQL Tools such as SQL Assistant, PL/SQL, Toad.Education:Required: BA / BS in computer science, management information systems, statistics, mathematics, marketing research or equivalent technical or semi-technical undergraduate degree with emphasis in statistics.
